existing_features.title: Add a new “Domain Setup” page that explains (in English) how to buy a domain from any registrar and configure DNS to point the domain to this Internet Computer app (include step-by-step instructions and clearly state that domain purchase happens outside the app).
Add navigation access to the new “Domain Setup” page from the existing site navigation (add a link in the footer Support or Quick Links section).

new_feature_requests.summary: Purchase a domain for the project
